Title: Extends provisions of law relating to the closure or transfer of a state-operated individualized residential alternative
Summary: Extends for two years the requirement for OPWDD to give a 90-day notice to the Senate, Assembly, and labor organizations of any closures or transfer of a state operated individualized residential alternative.
LawCode: Amd Part Q ยง2, Chap 59 of 2016
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part Q of chapter 59 of the laws of 2016 amending the mental hygiene law relating to the closure or transfer of a state-operated individualized residential alternative, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
